detailed_analysis.speaker: Speaker 1
detailed_analysis.text: We will talk about climate change.

grammar.corrected_text: He will talk about climate change.

detailed_analysis.judgment: A couple of minor grammar slips, but the message still shines through. Highly relevant. You clearly kept the main theme in focus. Your tone feels warm and confident — it’s pleasant to read. Even-tempered expression — clear without being flat. Strongly focused *and* full of positive energy — that’s a rare combo.

speaker_summary.Speaker 1: A few grammatical quirks show up, but your intent stays clear. You stay laser-focused on the discussion — every point feels purposeful.
